title: Executioner Mundo Delay

replies.body:
Heya Valaii,

Thanks for the report! I'll load him up in a bit and see if I can get a repro for this.  :)

I made a post not too long ago about Illaois spirit, think you could try that out? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/BNAQfK3g-illaoi-spirit-doesnt-take-much-tower-damage

(Aram)
